video.title: Foyle's War
video.synopsis: Set during World War II, this crime drama follows police inspector Christopher Foyle, who learns that crooks don't stop for anything -- not even war.

episodes.synopsis: Foyle has no shortage of suspects when the German wife of a local aristocrat is found murdered -- with a swastika carved into a nearby tree.
episodes.title: The German Woman

episodes.synopsis: A murder at an exclusive countryside hotel brings Foyle into contact with a group of English Nazi sympathizers.
episodes.title: The White Feather

episodes.synopsis: A conscientious objector dies in police custody, setting in motion a series of suspicious deaths and a complicated puzzle for Foyle.
episodes.title: A Lesson in Murder

episodes.synopsis: In the course of investigating a murder, Foyle uncovers a plot to steal works of art being moved from a local museum to Wales for safekeeping.
episodes.title: Eagle Day

episodes.synopsis: Foyle's investigation of a body found on a deserted beach puts at risk the donation of American aid.
episodes.title: Fifty Ships

episodes.synopsis: Pilots and their girlfriends live fast and die young in a story of greed and passion where Foyle finds appearances are deceptive.
episodes.title: Among the Few

episodes.synopsis: Divided loyalties lead to revenge and murder when a businessman puts profits before principles in a secret pact with the Nazis.
episodes.title: War Games

episodes.synopsis: Foyle finds himself accused of a serious offense, which complicates his hunt for a murderer at a sinister hotel.
episodes.title: The Funk Hole

episodes.synopsis: Investigating a suspicious death, Foyle gets caught up in the rivalry between the established spy agency MI5 and the newly created SOE.
episodes.title: The French Drop

episodes.synopsis: Sabotage, murder and adultery at a pioneering RAF hospital bring Foyle face to face with the devastating physical and emotional consequences of war.
episodes.title: Enemy Fire

episodes.synopsis: A murdered farmer and the crash landing of a German plane present a confusing case. Spring's in the air, and Foyle's not immune to a whiff of romance.
episodes.title: They Fought in the Fields

episodes.synopsis: An unexploded bomb at a busy shipyard leads to a startling discovery in a complex story of greed and politics.
episodes.title: A War of Nerves

episodes.synopsis: As the first American GIs arrive to build an airbase near Hastings, a barmaid's murder further strains tense relations between locals and Yanks.
episodes.title: Invasion

episodes.synopsis: A top secret biological warfare experiment goes very wrong, complicating a murder investigation and threatening the life of Foyle's faithful driver.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: The death of a young munitions worker and the murder of Paul Milner's wife seem linked, and Foyle strives to clear his sergeant from suspicion.
episodes.title: Bleak Midwinter

episodes.synopsis: While investigating gambling and sabotage, Foyle takes in his troubled goddaughter and her severely traumatized son, who refuses to speak.
episodes.title: Casualties of War

episodes.synopsis: DS Milner's investigation of transportation fraud sets in motion a series of events that bring Foyle back to the force.
episodes.title: Plan of Attack

episodes.synopsis: At a psychiatric clinic for troubled soldiers, the investigation of a doctor's murder turns up no shortage of suspects among the patients and staff.
episodes.title: Broken Souls

episodes.synopsis: As all of Britain awaits the formal announcement of the war's end, Foyle reluctantly joins a committee preparing to keep public order.
episodes.title: All Clear

episodes.synopsis: Tracking an escaped Russian POW, Foyle becomes involved in a murder investigation conducted by his former subordinate, D.I. Paul Milner.
episodes.title: The Russian House

episodes.synopsis: While African American GIs wait for transport home, racial tensions run high at the base in Hastings -- particularly after a series of muggings.
episodes.title: Killing Time

episodes.synopsis: Foyle probes the mysterious motives of James Devereaux, a former POW who refuses to defend himself against treason charges.
episodes.title: The Hide

episodes.synopsis: During the hunt for a Russian spy ring, Foyle reconnects with Sam, who now works for a nuclear scientist and is married to a political candidate.
episodes.title: The Eternity Ring

episodes.synopsis: Foyle's investigation into the deaths of several high-ranking Russian defectors uncovers a suspicious government listening station.
episodes.title: The Cage

episodes.synopsis: Foyle must protect an ex-Nazi MI5 intelligence asset from assassination attempts and American authorities.
episodes.title: Sunflower
